scripts.build: bun run build:inject && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp src/windows/*.html dist/ && cp icon.png dist/
scripts.release: bun run sync-version && tauri build && mkdir -p release && cp -r src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg/*.dmg release/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/*.app release/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo '✨ 打包完成！文件已复制到项目根目录的 release/ 文件夹中'
